# How to set up git lfs: 

0) cloned the platinum_graph repo

1) Dotmotif fixes
pip3 uninstall dotmotif
cd /meshAfterParty
git submodule init
git submodule update
pip3 install ./dotmotif

3) Had to compy the cave client files from current machine
root@at-compute006:~/.cloudvolume/secrets# vim cave-secret.json
root@at-compute006:~/.cloudvolume/secrets# vim chunkedgraph-secret.json

4) Make sure jupyter notebook will do autocompletion: 
pip3 install --upgrade jedi==0.17.2
